level.heading: Collection of overpayments.
level.text: An overpayment by the Department to a child development center, child development home, or to an in-home caregiver who is continuing to provide day care services shall be collectible in any amount.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-16, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-401.
